ghostPost.title: Minimum NGINX version
ghostPost.excerpt: The recommended NGINX version for Ghost is 1.9.5.
ghostPost.meta_title: Minimum NGINX Version required for installing an instance of Ghost
ghostPost.meta_description: The recommended NGINX version for Ghost is 1.9.5.

ghostPost.plaintext:
The SSL configuration pulls in a dependency on HTTP/2 (preferred protocol).
Default setup without modifications requires NGINX 1.9.5.
ghostPost.html: The SSL configuration pulls in a dependency on HTTP/2 (preferred protocol). Default setup without modifications requires NGINX 1.9.5.
